20110119170952.000|20110119170954.000|TR0| Well, you know, Carol, this is a very

20110119171002.000|20110119171004.000|TR0|to confront this head-on.
20110119171004.000|20110119171006.000|TR0|

20110119171009.000|20110119171011.000|TR0|time -- we'll start with that.

20110119171018.000|20110119171020.000|TR0|duty military.  Let's look at the numbers

20110119171027.000|20110119171030.000|TR0|duty in the Army in 2010, there were 156 
20110119171030.000|20110119171032.000|TR0|suicides.  That does show a slight 
20110119171032.000|20110119171034.000|TR0|decline, the first one since 2004.  But 
20110119171034.000|20110119171037.000|TR0|keep looking at those numbers, Carol.
20110119171037.000|20110119171039.000|TR0|

20110119174751.000|20110119174754.000|TR0|
20110119174754.000|20110119174756.000|TR0|It was 23 years ago in February of 1988 on 
20110119174756.000|20110119174758.000|TR0|a wintry day in Hartford that I announced 
20110119174758.000|20110119174801.000|TR0|that I would be a candidate for the United 
20110119174801.000|20110119174803.000|TR0|States Senate. Standing with me as I began

20110119174826.000|20110119174829.000|TR0|children. Six of whom are here today. 
20110119174829.000|20110119174831.000|TR0|Tennessee -- in order of age. Tennessee is 
20110119174831.000|20110119174833.000|TR0|number one, Eden, Yitz, Maddy, Yoav and, 
20110119174833.000|20110119174836.000|TR0|in the hallway, Camilla. Our youngest

20110119174841.000|20110119174843.000|TR0|with her husband, Daniel. And as you can

20110119174845.000|20110119174848.000|TR0|God's help, Hani will give birth to their 
20110119174848.000|20110119174850.000|TR0|first child, our eleventh grandchild. Talk 
20110119174850.000|20110119174852.000|TR0|about the circle of life.      So as I 
20110119174852.000|20110119174855.000|TR0|look back to 1988, I know what a lucky guy 
20110119174855.000|20110119174857.000|TR0|I am. Privileged for the years since then

20110119174916.000|20110119174918.000|TR0|

20110119174921.000|20110119174923.000|TR0|make this announcement at this hotel. And 
20110119174923.000|20110119174925.000|TR0|it, too, involves a life circle. During 
20110119174925.000|20110119174928.000|TR0|the first eight years of my life, my 
20110119174928.000|20110119174930.000|TR0|father, mother, then one sister, though 
20110119174930.000|20110119174932.000|TR0|the other sister, Ellen, is here, and I 
20110119174932.000|20110119174935.000|TR0|lived in a cold water flat on the second 
20110119174935.000|20110119174937.000|TR0|floor of my grandmother's house at 42 
20110119174937.000|20110119174939.000|TR0|Hawthorne Street right here in Stamford, 
20110119174939.000|20110119174942.000|TR0|Connecticut. That house and the rest of 
20110119174942.000|20110119174944.000|TR0|the street was demolished in the early 
20110119174944.000|20110119174946.000|TR0|'60s for urban redevelopment, but it was 
20110119174946.000|20110119174949.000|TR0|located right about where this Marriott 
20110119174949.000|20110119174951.000|TR0|Hotel is today.
20110119174951.000|20110119174953.000|TR0|
20110119174953.000|20110119174956.000|TR0|As I think about the journey that I've

20110119175008.000|20110119175010.000|TR0|America seeking freedom and they found it.

20110119175012.000|20110119175015.000|TR0|opportunities and they got them. But even 
20110119175015.000|20110119175017.000|TR0|they could not have dreamed that their

20110119175045.000|20110119175048.000|TR0|country.
20110119175048.000|20110119175050.000|TR0|
20110119175050.000|20110119175052.000|TR0|And I will tell you, that as I look back, 
20110119175052.000|20110119175055.000|TR0|some of the most satisfying moments of 
20110119175055.000|20110119175057.000|TR0|service that I've had are the ones that 
20110119175057.000|20110119175059.000|TR0|usually don't get any public attention. 
20110119175059.000|20110119175102.000|TR0|When my great staff and I have been able 
20110119175102.000|20110119175104.000|TR0|to provide support to one of you, a 
20110119175104.000|20110119175106.000|TR0|constituent, in a moment of need. Whether 
20110119175106.000|20110119175109.000|TR0|it was protecting your family from losing 
20110119175109.000|20110119175111.000|TR0|your home to foreclosure, or helping the 
20110119175111.000|20110119175113.000|TR0|parents of a sick child get the health 
20110119175113.000|20110119175116.000|TR0|care they need, or ensuring that a World 
20110119175116.000|20110119175118.000|TR0|War II veteran finally received the medals 
20110119175118.000|20110119175120.000|TR0|and recognition he was due for his service 
20110119175120.000|20110119175123.000|TR0|decades before. Those were moments of 
20110119175123.000|20110119175125.000|TR0|great satisfaction.
20110119175125.000|20110119175128.000|TR0|
20110119175128.000|20110119175130.000|TR0|I'm also grateful, of course, for what 
20110119175130.000|20110119175132.000|TR0|I've had the opportunity to accomplish in 
20110119175132.000|20110119175135.000|TR0|the Senate itself. What I've been able to 
20110119175135.000|20110119175137.000|TR0|do, for instance, to protect our 
20110119175137.000|20110119175139.000|TR0|environment, which was has been a 
20110119175139.000|20110119175142.000|TR0|life-long priority for me. Leading fights 
20110119175142.000|20110119175144.000|TR0|against air and water pollution, working 
20110119175144.000|20110119175146.000|TR0|hard to build coalitions to do something 
20110119175146.000|20110119175149.000|TR0|about climate change, cleaning up Long 
20110119175149.000|20110119175151.000|TR0|Island Sound, protecting the Connecticut 
20110119175151.000|20110119175153.000|TR0|River and creating Connecticut's first and 
20110119175153.000|20110119175156.000|TR0|only national park site -- Weir Farm.
20110119175156.000|20110119175158.000|TR0|
20110119175158.000|20110119175200.000|TR0|I'm also proud of what I've been able to 
20110119175200.000|20110119175203.000|TR0|do for Connecticut businesses. Helping 
20110119175203.000|20110119175205.000|TR0|them to keep and add jobs in our state, 
20110119175205.000|20110119175208.000|TR0|particularly in our defense industries, 
20110119175208.000|20110119175210.000|TR0|and to work with a lot of other people on 
20110119175210.000|20110119175212.000|TR0|that thrilling day that we saved Submarine 
20110119175212.000|20110119175215.000|TR0|Base New London. Thank you.      And I'm 
20110119175215.000|20110119175217.000|TR0|grateful for the opportunity I've had to 
20110119175217.000|20110119175219.000|TR0|keep our country and people safe in a 
20110119175219.000|20110119175222.000|TR0|dangerous world. As a member, now a senior 
20110119175222.000|20110119175224.000|TR0|member of the Senate --
20110119175224.000|20110119175226.000|TR0|
20110119175226.000|20110119175229.000|TR0|CAROL COSTELLO, CNN ANCHOR: We're going to 
20110119175229.000|20110119175231.000|TR0|jump away from this news conference being

20110119175233.000|20110119175236.000|TR0|the people of Connecticut for voting him

20110119175238.000|20110119175240.000|TR0|talks about his service to the people of 
20110119175240.000|20110119175243.000|TR0|Connecticut.
20110119175243.000|20110119175245.000|TR0|
20110119175245.000|20110119175248.000|TR0|We want to know what it means to the wider 
20110119175248.000|20110119175250.000|TR0|country, though, to the make-up of the 
20110119175250.000|20110119175252.000|TR0|Senate. And for that we go to Wolf Blitzer 
20110119175252.000|20110119175255.000|TR0|in Washington.
20110119175255.000|20110119175257.000|TR0|
